welcome.p1: Welcome to my website! My name is Eugene Ohvatuk (nickname SBV) and I've been doing web development for more than a year. My main technology stack is React. I try to create web applications that are beautiful, easy to use and as efficient as possible.
welcome.p2: On this website I present my work and experiments in web development. Here you can read about my projects and learn more about how I work.
welcome.p3: Be assured that no personal information is collected on my site. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me by email ohvatuki@gmail.com or via the feedback form.
welcome.p4: Thanks for visiting my site, I hope you find a lot of interesting things here!

content.p1: I have a specialized secondary education and qualification as a software engineer. For one and a half years I am actively involved in web development, and during this time I have gained considerable experience in this area.
content.p2: I am proficient in HTML, CSS (as well as the SASS preprocessor) and JavaScript, including ES6 syntax. In the last six months I've been writing applications in TypeScript using React and Redux TK libraries. I am constantly improving my skills and learning new things.
content.p3: However, my work is not limited to the frontend. I also have experience with the server side of applications using Node.js and the Express framework. I am also familiar with SQL, and I have experience with databases (I used PostgreSQL for my purposes).
content.p4: I am ready to apply my knowledge and web development skills to new projects and continue my professional growth. I am looking for a Frontend Developer position with a company where I can gain new experience and learn more about modern technologies. I look forward to discussing my qualification and joining your team.
